meta_title: What is Infant Mortality? Solving Early Asset Failure in 2026
meta_description: 70% of unplanned downtime traces to infant mortality. Learn why early asset failures happen and how Factory AI eliminates commissioning risks in under 14 days.
title: What is Infant Mortality? The Definitive Guide to Early Life Asset Failure and Reliability in 2026

image_prompt: A high-end, photo-realistic wide shot of a modern industrial manufacturing floor in 2026. In the foreground, a diverse team of three maintenance professionals (two men, one woman) are inspecting a newly installed, large industrial pump and motor assembly. They are wearing clean, professional PPE including white hard hats, clear safety glasses, and high-visibility vests. One technician is pointing at a connection point on the pump while another holds a ruggedized industrial tablet (viewed from the back, showing a sleek carbon-fiber casing, no screen visible). The third technician is checking a sensor lead. The environment is brightly lit, clean, and organized, representing a high-tech "brownfield" facility. The background shows other machinery and a blurred overhead conveyor system. No text or logos are visible. Full-body shots of the professionals to show the scale of the equipment.
